Text:
Here is proper torrent :)

Enjoy folks

Hi mate, thanks for the patch...
But i have really no idea how to unzip it! 
i can't extract it as it is not rar, daemon tools doesn't see it. how do I do this? 
and where is the text document with the patch description?

regards

@drpittbull
open winrar click on options 
then click on settings
when u get setting window click the "integration" tab
you should see user defined archive extensions at bottom of the settings window
type in "001" then click ok 
now winrar should be able to extract this torrent 
:)
THanks, the link to your first upload seemed to be broken :)
Im afraid that they didnt fix the problem with the FPS when flying over terrain & cities

anyone can tell me how to fix it?
